original_text: If they pick up a snake, it will not hurt them. If they drink poison, it will not hurt them. They will put their hands on ill people, and God will make those people well.’
korean_text: 뱀을 집어올리며 무슨 독을 마실지라도 해를 받지 아니하며 병든 사람에게 손을 얹은즉 나으리라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: If they pick up a snake
They will put their hands on ill people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아픈 사람들에게 손을 얹을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and God will make those people well
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그 사람들을 낫게 하실 것입니다
